Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: -1 on principle - we are done with changes for v1.0

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~wlahti given we are on home stretch for 1.0 and this is not crucial for 1.0 , can we move Fix Version to "future" please ?

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Moved to Future. It isn't needed now but will be extremely helpful for serviceability in the future.
